articles.author: Chloe Hart
articles.title: NRL community launches fundraising appeal for Mose Masoe after career-ending spinal injury - ABC News
articles.description: Mose Masoe is paralysed from the shoulders down, having suffered a horrific injury during a match in England last year. Now, the NRL is joining the likes of Alex McKinnon to help raise funds for the former Samoa international.
articles.content:
One tackle ended Mose Masoe's rugby league career, leaving him paralysed from the shoulders down.
Key points:
